aboutMe.introMain: Hi, I'm Benjamin. A few years ago, I discovered the possibilities and challenges of software development and became increasingly engaged with it until the passion truly ignited and now I can't imagine doing anything else professionally. I'm eager to learn, hardworking, and I love diving into new technologies.
aboutMe.introOne: I'm based in Schoeningen, located near Braunschweig / Wolfsburg / Magdeburg. I'm very open to remote work and comfortable with commutes when needed. Relocation isn't currently planned.
aboutMe.introTwo: I love learning new technologies and can quickly get up to speed with new tools and frameworks. I also find AI fascinating, integrating it into products in a practical and meaningful way.
aboutMe.introThree: To solve problems, I work in a structured way: first understand the problem, work out solution approaches, then implement a clean solution. I care about readability, performance, and a great user experience. I find great joy in contributing to a team and helping each other grow.

skills.mainText: Frontend development changes fast, and I keep up by staying consistent: I invest a lot of time, practice regularly and refine my skills step by step. I enjoy learning new techniques and tools and applying them in real projects.
skills.requestText: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

projects.question: What is this project about?

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

polloLoco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy boss hen.

pokedex.description: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

references.headline: What my colleagues say about me

janisch.text: Benjamin has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.

fischer.text: I had the good fortune of working with Benjamin in a group project at the Developer Akademie that involved a lot of effort. He always stayed calm, cool and focused and made sure our team was set up for success. He is super knowledgeable, easy to work with and I would happily work with him again given the chance.

schulz.text: Our project benefited enormously from Benjamins efficient way of working.

weber.text: Working with Benjamin was a great experience. His problem-solving skills are exceptional.

general.title: General information
general.text: The following information will provide you with an easy to navigate overview of what will happen with your personal data when you visit this website. The term “personal data” comprises all data that can be used to personally identify you. For detailed information about the subject matter of data protection, please consult our Data Protection Declaration, which we have included beneath this copy.

recording.title: Data recording on this website
recording.responsibleTitle: Who is the responsible party for the recording of data on this website?
recording.responsibleText: The data on this website is processed by the website operator. The operator’s contact details can be found in the section “Information about the responsible party” in this Privacy Policy.
recording.howTitle: How do we record your data?
recording.howText: On the one hand, your data are collected by you communicating them to us. This may, for instance, be information you enter into our contact form. Other data are recorded by our IT systems automatically or after you consent to its recording during your website visit. This data comprises primarily technical information (e.g., web browser, operating system, or time the site was accessed).
recording.whatForTitle: What purposes do we use your data for?
recording.whatForText: Part of the data is collected to guarantee the error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior. If contracts can be concluded or initiated via the website, the transmitted data will also be processed for contract offers, orders or other order inquiries.

rights.title: What rights do you have as far as your information is concerned?
rights.text: You have the right to receive information about the source, recipients, and purposes of your archived personal data at any time without having to pay a fee for such disclosures. You also have the right to demand that your data are rectified or eradicated. If you have consented to data processing, you have the option to revoke this consent at any time.

section2.title: 2. Hosting
section2.intro: We are hosting the content of our website at the following provider:

external.title: External Hosting
external.text: This website is hosted externally. Personal data collected on this website are stored on the servers of the host. These may include, but are not limited to, IP addresses, contact requests, metadata and communications, contract information, contact information, names, web page access, and other data generated through a web site.
external.purpose: The external hosting serves the purpose of fulfilling the contract with our potential and existing customers (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR) and in the interest of secure, fast, and efficient provision of our online services by a professional provider (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).
external.instructions: Our host(s) will only process your data to the extent necessary to fulfil its performance obligations and to follow our instructions with respect to such data.

hostDetails.title: We are using the following host(s):
hostDetails.name: HOSTINGER operations, UAB

dpa.title: Data processing
dpa.text: We have concluded a data processing agreement (DPA) for the use of the above-mentioned service. This is a contract mandated by data privacy laws that guarantees that they process personal data of our website visitors only based on our instructions and in compliance with the GDPR.

dataProtection.title: Data protection
dataProtection.text: The operators of this website and its pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. Hence, we handle your personal data as confidential information and in compliance with the statutory data protection regulations and this Data Protection Declaration.

controller.title: Information about the responsible party (referred to as the “controller” in the GDPR)
controller.text: The data processing controller on this website is:
controller.definition: The controller is the natural person or legal entity that single-handedly or jointly with others makes decisions as to the purposes of and resources for the processing of personal data.

storage.title: Storage duration
storage.text: Unless a more specific storage period has been specified in this privacy policy, your personal data will remain with us until the purpose for which it was collected no longer applies.

legalBasis.title: General information on the legal basis for the data processing on this website
legalBasis.text: If you have consented to data processing, we process your personal data on the basis of Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR or Art. 9 (2)(a) GDPR, if special categories of data are processed according to Art. 9 (1) DSGVO. In the case of explicit consent to the transfer of personal data to third countries, the data processing is also based on Art. 49 (1)(a) GDPR.

recipients.title: Recipients of personal data
recipients.text: In the scope of our business activities, we cooperate with various external parties. In some cases, this also requires the transfer of personal data to these external parties. We only disclose personal data to external parties if this is required as part of the fulfillment of a contract or if we have a legitimate interest.

revocation.title: Revocation of your consent to the processing of data
revocation.text: A wide range of data processing transactions are possible only subject to your express consent. You can also revoke at any time any consent you have already given us. This shall be without prejudice to the lawfulness of any data collection that occurred prior to your revocation.

objection.title: Right to object to the collection of data in special cases; right to object to direct advertising (Art. 21 GDPR)
objection.text: IN THE EVENT THAT DATA ARE PROCESSED ON THE BASIS OF ART. 6(1)(E) OR (F) GDPR, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO AT ANY TIME OBJECT TO THE PROCESSING OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA BASED ON GROUNDS ARISING FROM YOUR UNIQUE SITUATION.
objection.directAds: IF YOUR PERSONAL DATA IS BEING PROCESSED IN ORDER TO ENGAGE IN DIRECT ADVERTISING, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO OBJECT TO THE PROCESSING OF YOUR AFFECTED PERSONAL DATA FOR THE PURPOSES OF SUCH ADVERTISING AT ANY TIME.

complaint.title: Right to log a complaint with the competent supervisory agency
complaint.text: In the event of violations of the GDPR, data subjects are entitled to log a complaint with a supervisory agency, in particular in the member state where they usually maintain their domicile.

portability.title: Right to data portability
portability.text: You have the right to have data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a common, machine-readable format.

rectification.title: Information about, rectification and eradication of data
rectification.text: Within the scope of the applicable statutory provisions, you have the right to demand information about your archived personal data, their source and recipients as well as the purpose of the processing of your data at any time.

restriction.title: Right to demand processing restrictions
restriction.text: You have the right to demand the imposition of restrictions as far as the processing of your personal data is concerned.
restriction.cases: The right to demand restriction of processing applies in the following cases: If you dispute the correctness of your data; if the processing is unlawful; if we no longer need the data but you need them for legal claims; or if an objection pursuant to Art. 21(1) GDPR is being verified.

encryption.title: SSL and/or TLS encryption
encryption.text: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, this website uses either an SSL or a TLS encryption program.

section4.title: 4. Recording of data on this website

logs.title: Server log files
logs.text: The provider of this website and its pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser communicates to us automatically.
logs.basis: This data is recorded on the basis of Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. The operator of the website has a legitimate interest in the technically error free depiction and the optimization of the operator’s website.

contactForm.title: Contact form
contactForm.text: If you submit inquiries to us via our contact form, the information provided in the contact form will be stored by us in order to handle your inquiry.
contactForm.basis: The processing of these data is based on Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR, if your request is related to the execution of a contract or if it is necessary to carry out pre-contractual measures.

directContact.title: Request by e-mail, telephone, or fax
directContact.text: If you contact us by e-mail, telephone or fax, your request, including all resulting personal data will be stored and processed by us for the purpose of processing your request.
directContact.basis: These data are processed on the basis of Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR if your inquiry is related to the fulfillment of a contract or is required for the performance of pre-contractual measures.
